about_the_game:
Real-time tactics with active pause. The basis of the gameplay is microcontrol of a small group of space troopers. Timely maneuvering and effective use of troopers' equipment will be the key to victory in combat with the planet's wild fauna, ancient autonomous constructs, and an unknown supernatural enemy.

The energy shortage has led to the need for an expedition to alien worlds. Having passed through a space anomaly, the Expedition ship entered the orbit of an unknown planet.

The planet, called the Shadow World, is a mysterious and alien place. An environment unsuitable for human life, aggressive flora and fauna - this is only a small part of what the researchers will encounter.

The expedition will have to learn the fate of an ancient civilization that once existed on the planet, and defeat an even more ancient and powerful entity that has taken over this world.

Story-driven Campaign

Choose the missions that the landing party will go on - completing them will allow you to gain experience for your troopers and resources for research, as well as advance the plot.

Full control over the weapons and equipment of the landing group

Select weapon and equipment for each trooper based on the needs of the mission and the soldier's skills.

Research

Obtaining new equipment and upgrading existing will help you cope with the growing complexity of landing operations and new threats.

The expedition will have to learn the fate of an ancient civilization that once existed on the planet, and defeat an even more ancient and powerful entity that has taken over this world.

name: Expedition: Shadow World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more, ARMv8 CPU
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Expedition: Shadow World is a tactical game about an expedition sent to a distant planet to extract energy resources. Command a group of five troopers in real-time battles with a tactical pause and discover the mystery of the planet.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
